snippet: Jahmal Lightfoot’s testimony is at the center of the criminal case against nine officers in what prosecutors have described as an orchestrated assault and attempted cover up.
abstract: Jahmal Lightfoot is unable to identify Eliseo Perez Jr, former assistant chief for security at Rikers Island, during testimony at criminal trial of nine current and former Rikers corrections officers; officers are accused of beating Lightfoot at behest of Perez, and then covering up assault.

byline.original: By WINNIE HU and KATE PASTOR

lead_paragraph: Jahmal Lightfoot’s testimony is at the center of the criminal case against nine officers in what prosecutors have described as an orchestrated assault and attempted cover up.

headline.main: Former Rikers Inmate Can’t Identify Officer He Believes Ordered His Attack
headline.print_headline: Ex-Rikers Inmate Can’t Identify Officer He Believes Ordered His Attack
